# ExternalPurchaseCustomLink.NoticeResult

**Enumeration**

The result of showing the disclosure notice.

## Declaration

```swift
enum NoticeResult
```

## Overview

This value is the result of calling [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/ExternalPurchaseCustomLink/showNotice(type:)].

If the value is [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/ExternalPurchaseCustomLink/NoticeResult/continued], the customer choses to continue and your app can communicate and promote offers for purchase in a distribution channel of your choice. Otherwise, don’t continue.

## Getting notice results

- **ExternalPurchaseCustomLink.NoticeResult.cancelled**: The customer chooses to cancel; don’t offer external purchases.
- **ExternalPurchaseCustomLink.NoticeResult.continued**: The customer chooses to continue; the app can offer external purchases.

## Displaying the disclosure sheet

- **showNotice(type:)**: Displays the system disclosure notice sheet and asks the customer whether to continue.
- **ExternalPurchaseCustomLink.NoticeType**: The custom link out style that informs the type of disclosure notice to display.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
